googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRules: Any registered Georgia voter may request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: You will need a valid GA driver’s license or GA identification card in order to use Georgia’s online voter registration system. If you do not have this, you can still register to vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Bring your Georgia driver's license or state ID card with you. If you don't have one, bring ONE photo ID that shows your name, and ONE document that shows your name and current address.  Acceptable documents include a utility bill, bank statement, paycheck, residential lease, or any government document that shows your name and address.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
To register in Georgia you must:

  * be a citizen of the United States
  * be a legal resident of Georgia and of the county in which you want to vote
  * be 18 years old within six months after the day of registration, and be 18 years old to vote
  * not be serving a sentence for having been convicted of a felony involving moral turpitude
  * not have been judicially determined to be mentally incompetent, unless the disability has been removed
